member.name: T:XmltvParser.XmltvAudio
member.summary: The class that describes an XMLTV audio tag.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvAudio.IsPresent
member.summary: Return true if audio is present; false otherwise.

member.name: M:XmltvParser.XmltvAudio.GetInstance(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Get a loaded instance of the class.
member.param: An XmlReader instance for the tag.
member.returns: An instance of the class with the tag data loaded.

member.name: T:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel
member.summary: The class that describes an XMLTV channel.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel.Channels
member.summary: Get or set the collection of channels in an XMLTV file.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel.Id
member.summary: Get the ID of the channel.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel.DisplayNames
member.summary: Get the display names of a channel.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel.Icon
member.summary: Get the icon that represents the channel.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel.Urls
member.summary: Get the URL's that are related to the channel.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel.IdFormat
member.summary: Get or set the format of the ID attribute.

member.name: M:XmltvParser.XmltvChannel.GetInstance(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Get a new instance of the XmltvChannel class with data loaded.
member.param: An XmlReader instance for the channel tag.
member.returns: An XmltvChannel instance with data loaded.

member.name: T:XmltvParser.XmltvController
member.summary: The class that describes the Xmltv parser controller.

member.name: P:XmltvParser.XmltvController.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: Get the full assembly version number.

member.name: M:XmltvParser.XmltvController.Process(System.String,DomainObjects.ImportFileSpec)
member.param: The actual file path.
The file definition.
member.returns: An error message or null if the file is processed successfully.

member.name: M:XmltvParser.XmltvController.ProcessChannels(DomainObjects.LanguageCode,DomainObjects.ImportImageMode)
member.summary: Create stations from the XMLTV channel data.
member.param: The language code. May be null
True to download images; false otherwise.
member.returns: A list of stations or null if no channel data exists.

member.name: M:XmltvParser.XmltvController.ProcessChannels(System.String,DomainObjects.ImportFileSpec)
member.summary: Process the channel information from an XMLTV file.
member.param: The actual file path.
The file definition.
member.returns: An error message or null if the file was processed successfully.
